items.name: Nimis
enchantMods: Your Arc Towers deal 25% increased Damage
explicitMods: Projectiles are fired in random directions
flavourText: Too much of something is bad enough;
too much of nothing is just as tough.

items.name: The Fledgling
enchantMods: Kinetic Blast has a 75% chance for an additional explosion
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: Projectiles cannot collide with Enemies in Close Range
flavourText: The single well-placed arrow that changes the world
must be preceded by ten thousand practice shots.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that causes nearby enemies to take more physical damage.
explicitMods:
Nearby Enemies take at least 20% more Physical Damage,
 raising up to 40% as they stay in the Aura for 4 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 12% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Spell Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Zeel's Amplifier
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
explicitMods: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently
flavourText: "Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis,
is the only secret worth discovering."
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill with a reservation.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 24% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Reserve Life instead of Mana
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: 1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 55% increased Critical Strike Chance during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Dying Sun
explicitMods: 20% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 8% increased Damage
Recover 1% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

items.name: Dusk Caress
implicitMods: While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Gain 1 Rage on Hit with Attacks, no more than once every 1.2 seconds
explicitMods: 50% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
craftedMods: Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers
+1 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
23% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a buff that grants different bonuses to melee skills depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.
explicitMods: Melee Skills deal 16% more Area Damage while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 5% less Area of Effect while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 16% more Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
Melee Skills deal 5% less Area Damage while in Sand Stance
20% increased Projectile Attack Damage while in Blood Stance
20% increased Projectile Speed while in Sand Stance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a series of quick teleports towards a targeted location. If using the "Attack in Place" option, the direction is reversed. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports mark curse skills.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

items.name: Glyph Heart
fracturedMods: +1 to Level of all Skill Gems

items.name: Replica Voidwalker
enchantMods: 16% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you've Killed Recently
explicitMods: You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Chain +1 times while you have Phasing
flavourText: "Test subject was able to walk into the walls of his chamber after breaking a rabbit's neck.
He was not fast enough, however. Suggest we begin excavation to retrieve prototype."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.
explicitMods: Can use Items requiring up to Level 100
Minions' Attacks deal 126 to 184 additional Physical Damage
Minions deal 76% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.
explicitMods: Summoned Golems have 23% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Golems grant 10% increased Attack and Cast Speed

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism

a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 30% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 7% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect

flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal
